title: New England Cigar Expo (Round 2)
itunes:title: New England Cigar Expo (Round 2)
description: Round 2 of The New England Cigar Expo live in Providence, RI. Dave Garofalo & Mr Jonathan invite random guests from the crowd to partake in a friendly game of trivia, but look out when you add alcohol into the equation! Brandon Salomon from Cigar Masters sits down to talk about the state of the industry, and all things stogie. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
